speedrunapi.config.mcsrbugmine.option.pr: Stops you from freezing your client by doing Ctrl+Q on a mine ingredient in the Mine Crafter.
No longer get disconnected when you send a packet while entering a mine.
No longer crash upon taking damage with soul link active.
speedrunapi.config.mcsrbugmine.option.ob: Gives the No Drops mine ingredient an unlock condition. According to etanaratsastaja, software engineer at Mojang, it was originally dropped randomly from mobs with a 5% chance, so that's the unlock condition provided here.
speedrunapi.config.mcsrbugmine.option.al: Allow Soul Link On LAN Servers
Allows the usage of Soul Link when your singleplayer world is open to LAN.
speedrunapi.config.mcsrbugmine.option.fu: Restores the shield's ability to block attacks.
speedrunapi.config.mcsrbugmine.option.ob: Makes the dragon fire player unlock available by getting damaged from an Ender Dragon's area effect cloud rather than directly from its fireball.
Makes In It Together obtainable by changing the requirement from winning a special mine to winning any mine.
mcsrbugmine.advancements.unlocks.in_it_t: Complete a mine with the 'Soul Link' effect active
